items.title: HSBC downgrades Nvidia, sees 'limited room' for any upside despite recent drop
items.description: HSBC sees limited upside potential ahead for artificial intelligence darling Nvidia.

items.title: What value investor Bill Nygren is scooping up during the market rout
items.description: Bill Nygren says the market turmoil brought on by the Trump administration's aggressive tariffs creates an 'unusual' opportunity for bargain-hunting.

items.title: JPMorgan slashes bank sector estimates, downgrades U.S. Bancorp on economic impact from tariffs
items.description: Analyst Vivek Juneja cut his earnings estimates for U.S. banks, and warned "there is potential for further cuts" due to tariff changes Wednesday.

items.title: Two retailers could end up beneficiaries of tariffs, says Citi in upgrade
items.description: Citi analyst Paul Lejeuz upgraded shares of both TJX Companies and Ross Stores to a buy rating from neutral.

items.title: Investors should stay away from risk right now after Trump's tariff announcement, says Citi's Kate Moore
items.description: Moore's comments come after President Donald Trump signed a tariff plan that imposes steep levies on many countries.
